## Here is some inline code `r 1 + 1`

````{r, starwars-plot, fig.cap = "A ggplot of starwars stuff"}
library(tidyverse)

starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  
ggplot() + 
aes(x = height, 
    y = mass) + 
  geom_point()
````
